#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
char a[100009],b[100009],ch;
int t,ar[100009],k,l1,l2,carry,i;
scanf("%d",&t);
scanf("%c",&ch);
while(t--)
{
k=0;
carry=0;
scanf("%s",a);
scanf("%c",&ch);
scanf("%s",b);
scanf("%c",&ch);
l1=strlen(a)-1;
l2=strlen(b)-1;

while((l1!=-1)&&(l2!=-1))
{

ar[k]=(((int)a[l1]-65)+((int)b[l2]-65)+carry)%26;
carry=(((int)a[l1]-65)+((int)b[l2]-65)+carry)/26;
k++;
l1--;
l2--;
}

while(l1!=-1)
{
ar[k]=(((int)a[l1]-65)+carry)%26;
carry=(((int)a[l1]-65)+carry)/26;
k++;
l1--;
}

while(l2!=-1)
{
ar[k]=(((int)b[l2]-65)+carry)%26;
carry=(((int)b[l2]-65)+carry)/26;
k++;
l2--;
}
if(carry!=0)
{
ar[k]=carry%26;
k++;
}


for(i=(k-1);i>=0;i--)
printf("%c",(char)(ar[i]+65));
printf("\n");

}

}
